name: Work Insanity
description:
This game is for the 2020 entry of the A Game by its Cover jam.

Overworking can be a problem for our worker. What can you do to free him of his stress? Inspired by the 2016 Famicase entry Angry Man, this game is inspired by the troubles of your average worker.

Controls:

Arrow keys: Movement

Z: Attack

X: Jump

C: Shot weapon (when adquired)
